channel.title: Tiziano De Matteis
channel.description: Recent content on Tiziano De Matteis

item.description:
I’m currently a postdoc of SPCL Group at ETH Zurich. My principal research interests are related to Parallel and Distributed Computing with a particular focus in FPGAs for HPC, Data Stream Processing, and Energy Awareness in Parallel Computing.

I am a former member of Parallel Programming Model Group at University of Pisa.
